name: Pixel Cellar
tagline: We Design, Develop and Market Websites
description: Pixel Cellar is a small but perfectly formed, integrated digital studio with a reputation for quality, bespoke design and development across all digital campaigns – including e-commerce development and responsive website design. We can think as big as you need us to, but offer all the speed, flexibility and gratitude of a small web design studio. There are no layers of bureaucracy to pay for and none for us to hide behind. We’re open, honest, and good at what we do.
